item.title: An Intuitive Explanation for Inverse Propensity Weighting in Causal Inference
item.description: One of the well-established methods for causal inference is based on the Inverse Propensity Weighting (IPW). In this post we will use a simple example to build an intuition for IPW. Specifically, we will see how IPW is derived from a simple weighted average in order to account for varying treatment assignment rates in causal evaluation.
